markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Shillelagh](/Spells.aspx?ID=282)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 369 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deity**
[Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1  club  or  staff  you hold
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

The target grows vines and leaves, brimming with primal energy. The target becomes a _+1 striking weapon_ while in your hands, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two. Additionally, as long as you are on your home plane, attacks you make with the target against aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.
name: Shillelagh
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 369 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deity**
[Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

 

**Target** 1 [club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2) or [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12) you hold
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make a club or staff temporarily magical, and deal more damage to unnatural creatures.
</summary>
summary: Make a club or staff temporarily magical, and deal more damage to unnatural creatures.
summary_markdown: Make a club or staff temporarily magical, and deal more damage to unnatural creatures.
text: Shillelagh Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 369 4.0 Tradition Primal Deity Elven Pantheon Cast somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 club or staff you hold Duration 1 minute --- The target grows vines and leaves, brimming with primal energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon while in your hands, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two. Additionally, as long as you are on your home plane, attacks you make with the target against aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.
